contract_title: Phase 3 Batch 3A - Web Interface Consolidation & Enhancement

contract_details.description: Comprehensive web interface consolidation focusing on component deduplication, performance optimization, accessibility improvements, and unified design system implementation.
contract_details.background: Following initial web interface cleanup, Agent-7 is positioned to consolidate web components, eliminate duplication, and enhance user experience through performance and accessibility improvements.
objectives: Consolidate duplicate web components into unified library
Implement performance optimizations for web interfaces
Enhance accessibility compliance across all web components
Create unified design system with consistent styling
Optimize web asset loading and caching strategies
Implement responsive design improvements for mobile compatibility
deliverables: Unified web component library with consolidated functionality
Performance-optimized web interfaces with improved loading times
Accessibility-compliant web components meeting WCAG 2.1 standards
Unified design system with consistent styling and components
Optimized web asset management and caching implementation
Responsive design framework for cross-device compatibility
technical_requirements: Frontend frameworks (React, Vue.js, or similar component frameworks)
CSS frameworks and design systems (CSS-in-JS, styled-components)
Performance optimization tools (webpack, vite, asset optimization)
Responsive design frameworks (CSS Grid, Flexbox, media queries)
Web component consolidation and deduplication tools
success_criteria: Web component duplication reduced by 70% through consolidation
Web interface performance improved by 40% (loading times)
Accessibility compliance achieves 95% WCAG 2.1 AA standard
Unified design system implemented across all web interfaces
Web asset optimization reduces bundle size by 30%
Responsive design supports all major device categories

resources_required: Responsive design frameworks and testing tools

network_unlocks: Access to Web Interface Innovation Network

contract_history.details: Phase 3 Batch 3A web interface consolidation contract created for component deduplication and enhancement
